attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am sick of being constantly inundated with email requests to sign petitions on the governments web site. I have far more important things to do with my time.
I for one do not care if our 'beloved' HP sauce is made in Britain or Holland as long as it tastes the same! and I do not care if our 'engineers' fix washing machines, design buildings or build space shuttles. If an engineer wants to be in the same social class as a doctor or solicitor he should have gone to university to become a doctor or a solicitor.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
